{"id":767636239,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1659883844,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/767636239/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int len1 = word1.size(), len2 = word2.size();\n        int match[len1+1][len2+1];\n        memset(match, 0, sizeof(match));\n        for(int i=1; i<=len1; i++){\n            for(int j=1; j<=len2; j++){\n                if(word1[i-1] == word2[j-1]){\n                    match[i][j] = match[i-1][j-1] + 1;\n                }\n                else{\n                    match[i][j] = max(match[i-1][j], match[i][j-1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        int lcs = match[len1][len2];\n        // cout<<lcs<<endl;\n        return (len1 + len2 - (2 * lcs));\n    }\n};\n\n/*\n\nsea\n|\neat\n\nmatch[1][1] = 0;\nmatch[1][2] = 0;\nmatch[1][3] = 0;\n\nmatch[2][1] = match[1][0] + 1 = 1;\nmatch[2][2] = max(match[1][2], match[2][1]) = 1\nmatch[2][3] = max(match[1][3], match[2][2]) = 1 \n\nmatch[3][1] = max(match[2][1], match[3][0]) = 1\nmatch[3][2] = match[2][1] + 1 = 2\nmatch[3][3] = max(match[2][3], match[3][2]) = 1, 2 = 2\n\n\n\n*/","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
